Title: The Bright Side of the Moon
Writer: Cinzia Tani (short story), Massimo Guglielmi (screenplay), Alessandro Leone (screenplay)
Actors: Lyanka Gryu, Filipp Azarov, Olga Belyavskaya, Branko Djuric
Plot: Tonja has a dream, to walk on the moon. Tonja will become a cosmonaut just like her uncle Vladimir.
